TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed InkCanvasSelectionHitResult extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Identifies the various parts of a selection adorner on an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The method returns an InkCanvasSelectionHitResult to indicate which part of the selection adorner intersects or surrounds a . This is useful when performing drag-and-drop operations. ## XAML Text Usage This class is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples The following example demonstrates how use to determine whether to create a to initiate drag and drop. To implement drag and drop between two objects, see [How to: Drag and Drop Ink](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md). [!code-cs[InkDragDrop#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/InkDragDrop/Window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[InkDragDrop#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/InkDragDrop/Window1.xaml.vb#3)]
